We are 8.000 Aliens randomly generated, coming from the Nasar Planet. You can find us in the IMX platform, in the ETH layer 2, which means NO GAS FEES.

We have noticed that humans are having a very tough time trying to evolve without actually destroying themselves and the planet they live in. We were given the instruction of coming to give a hand and help humanity as we could. We took off from Nasar Planet some light years ago, and finally we are arriving on Earth to start our mission.

A spaceship of 2.000 Aliens is arriving first. Then, every 10 days a new spaceship with 2.000 more is going to land! Until we are 8.000!

Every 10 days, a new Spaceship will arrive on Earth until the fourth.

Owning an Alien gives you preferential access to the pre-sale of the next 2.000 Aliens and a lot of other perks and benefits!

  • 0% - FIRST SPACESHIP - 2.000 ALIENS. -

    Launching Pre-Sale of 800 aliens. - Breeding will only be possible between aliens of different spaceships. Giveaway of 10 NFTs.

  • 10% - PRE-SALE SOLD OUT-

    Giveaway of 100 MyHeritage DNA kits. See more on Discord!

  • 25% -SECOND SPACESHIP (10 days after) . - 2.000 ALIENS -

    Pre-sale of 800 aliens. Holders of the first spaceship will have preferential access to the whitelist. Crypto minery starts. Monthly rewards directly to holders wallets. Donation of 2,5% income to clean the oceans (when the second spaceship has sold out) We will donate to one of initiatives with a deeper impact on the subject.

  • 50% - THIRD SPACESHIP (10 days after). - 2.000 ALIENS -

    Pre-sale of 800 aliens. holders of the first and second spaceship will have preferential access to the whitelist. Donation of 2,5% income to clean the oceans (when the second spaceship has sold out) We will donate to one of initiatives with a deeper impact on the subject. Giveaway of 5 PARTY ALIENS.

  • 75% - FOURTH AND LAST SPACESHIP -PARTY ALIENS-

    PARTY ALIENS. - Party Aliens are the craziest Aliens out there. They are unic, weird, funny... Wholesome Aliens. 5 ultra rare Aliens will provide 1 ETH to each of its lucky holders.

  • 100% - NASAR ALIENS ARE COMING TO THE METAVERSE

    We will buy a parcel in Decentraland/ Sandbox for the community.
